comment._content: Eldest son of the Duke of Rutland. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duke_of_Rutland Do we know which Marquis of Granby this one is. The only thing I know for sure is that it isn't one of the many pubs.

comment._content: Thanks to both of you for the research on the young Duke.  We will expand the record when we update.
